name: Attack Of Black Ops
description:
Attack Of Black Ops is here

Stunning graphics & sounds!

"HURRY ! Attack is all over the war field & it's up to you to defeat all the soldiers before time runs out"

Tap to shoot - tap reload icon to reload

Game is equipped with on screen controls

Zombies Mode coming in next update!
----------------------------------------------------
We'd like to thank our Development, Design, and Management team members for their wonderful work on this project.
Thank you for downloading! We appreciate your continued support.
We appreciate you positive feedback and are working hard to develop your ideas into future updates.
